"Mischief Symbol":
"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual holographic symbol called a \"Mischief Symbol\" will appear around Central City.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find the Mischief Symbol."

"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual holographic symbol called a \"Mischief Symbol\" will appear in Exploration Sections.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find this Mischief Symbol.

You can locate the Mischief Symbol by using your Mag Sonar."
